title: Define TUI message types for streaming events
description: Create new TUI message types that map to AgentState changes: AgentTextMsg (output delta), AgentThinkingMsg (thinking delta), AgentToolStartMsg (tool invocation started), AgentToolEndMsg (tool completed), AgentMetricsMsg (usage update), AgentStatusMsg (status change). These replace or augment OutputMsg.
closed_reason: Added 6 new TUI message types (AgentTextMsg, AgentThinkingMsg, AgentToolStartMsg, AgentToolEndMsg, AgentMetricsMsg, AgentStatusMsg) to internal/tui/model.go. These map to agent.RunStatus and agent.ToolActivity for streaming updates. Each type includes doc comments explaining when it's sent.
